meta.title: Voicemail Existed — Duncan's Denial Proven False
meta.source_description: Duncan denied voicemail on May 4, proven false by audio transcript from March 21

contradictions.summary: Duncan Lustig-Prean claimed on 4 May 2025 that 'no answer phone message has been received'. This was false. A voicemail left on 21 March 2025 by Ben Carter directly references the IOPC, a safeguarding concern involving Alexander Voodoo, and suicide escalation. This folder contains both the voicemail audio and full transcript, proving Duncan's denial to be a deliberate obstruction of safeguarding accountability.

timeline_entries.summary: Voicemail left by Ben Carter to Duncan referencing IOPC, suicide escalation, and Alexander Voodoo. Proven to exist.
Duncan Lustig-Prean denies voicemail: 'No answer phone message has been received'.
